Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 32nd overall pick, by Boston (FBA) in 1966...
Injured on 8/21/1968 with a Pulled Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/7/1971, off Adam Hauge (TOL)...
Injured on 9/1/1972 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Hit first career homerun on 7/12/1974, off James Riley (NE)...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Bay City on 4/14/1977...
Won World Championship with Boston (FBA) in 1977...
Won World Championship with Boston (FBA) in 1980...
Signed as a free agent by West Texas on 2/13/1982 to a 2-year deal worth $962,513 per year...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Syracuse on 5/17/1983...
